alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:39PM EDT until June 10 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WALTON...WESTERN HOLMES AND WESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 439 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of De Funiak Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Millers Ferry, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill, Izagora, New Hope, Argyle, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad and Barker Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
